patterns: Can you tell me something about data science?
What is data science in simple words?
responses: Data science is the field of study that combines domain expertise, programming skills, and knowledge of mathematics and statistics to extract meaningful insights from data.

patterns: Why should i learn data science?
responses:
I have an amazing article by Dataflair which can answer your question.
 Link to the article: https://data-flair.training/blogs/why-learn-data-science/

patterns: What can I become after learning data science?
What are the job roles in data science?
responses:
Here are some of the job roles in Data Science: 
1. Data Analyst 
2. Data Engineers.
3. Database Administrator.
4. Machine Learning Engineer.
5. Data Scientist.
6. Data Architect.
7. Statistician.
8. Business Analyst.
 To know more about the above job titles and the work they do, I have an excellent article for you by Great Learning. 
	Link to the article: https://www.mygreatlearning.com/blog/different-data-science-jobs-roles-industry/
